description: Returns complete information about one rule groups namespace. To retrieve a list of rule groups namespaces, use ListRuleGroupsNamespaces.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the rule groups namespace that you want information for.

parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace containing the rule groups namespace.

nested_items.name: ruleGroupsNamespace
nested_items.description: The information about the rule groups namespace.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the rule groups namespace. For example, arn:aws:aps:<region>:123456789012:rulegroupsnamespace/ws-example1-1234-abcd-5678-ef90abcd1234/rulesfile1.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the rule groups namespace was created.

nested_items.name: data
nested_items.description: The rule groups file used in the namespace.

nested_items.name: modifiedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the rule groups namespace was most recently changed.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the rule groups namespace.

nested_items.name: statusCode
nested_items.description: The current status of the namespace.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the failure, if any.
